Title: azukiMap
Description: azukiMap is a Open Source "Web-Top" GIS application. It works on Silverlight and can use vector data, raster images and several types of map tile from servers as map data sources.
HomeWiki:
azukiMap is a Open Source "Web-Top" GIS application. It works on Silverlight and can use vector data, raster images and several types of map tile from servers as map data sources.


Demo

Volcano Sample http://farm.azukimap.jp/case/miyake/

Suported GIS Data Format

Vector

  1. PostGIS
  2. WKT

Raster

  1. WMS
  2. Jpeg, PNG file
  3. Tile indexed image file

Tile

  1. Bing Map
  2. KaMap tile
  3. GSI tile
  4. TMS (not yet)

Main Page

http://farm.azukimap.jp/wiki/doku.php
